Hey there people,

Nan is a Forester in Training (FIT), who received systematic training in Forestry, Geomatics for Environmental
Management both in Canada and China. Her diverse educational and professional experiences have equipped
her with skills in GIS, Python, visual analysis, 3D modeling, remote sensing, data analysis, and forest resources
management. Driven by a passion for problem-solving, Nan consistently demonstrates adaptability and a
commitment to delivering professional, timely, and reliable GIS and visual products and services. Her broad skill
set allows her to tackle complex challenges effectively and produce high-quality outcomes that meet the needs
of various projects and clients.
